summary: Adds four rings to the game, which have properties particularly useful for vampires who spend a lot of time in the sun.
descriptionHtml: Don't you just hate having no regeneration during the day if you're a vampire? Try this mod out! Four generic enchanted rings have been added to vendor item lists and to loot lists. These four types of rings give differing levels of regeneration for health, magicka and stamina. Even those who aren't vampires will find these rings useful to sell, as they will fetch a very high price from most merchants.
author: MysteryMan3
